name: Break_In
description: The base-building/FPS game where the aim is to make money, and invest it in defenses, traps, and other security measures to protect the rest of your stash. Take on other players' bases to make more money! NOTE: THIS GAME IS IN EARLY ACCESS - ONLY BUY IF PREPARED FOR BUGS, WIPES AND OTHER ISSUES.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8/Windows 8.1 Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core Processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8800/ATI Radeon HD 2600 (256MB minimum) Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Yes
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/Windows 8/Windows 8.1 Processor: 2.3 GHz Quad Core Processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX460/ATI Radeon HD 5850 (512MB minimum) Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Yes
